title: What is life skills education? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are several things which comes into life skills education some of them are: Leading OthersValues and EthicsEconomic Common SenseTeamworkEmpathyEffective CommunicationsSmart Consumer LiteracyEnvironment and SustainabilityCritical Thinking and Problem SolvingNow lets talk about “Leading Others” Leadership qualitiesLeadership traits, distinguish between positive and negative examples of these traits in the school, peer group, local community, and state.Famous personalities and their leadership qualitiesThe recognition of others’ effortsEmbracing problem solving skills and Conflict ResolutionFollowers and the cause of their leadersExplain the importance of active participation as a followerIdentify the roles of leaders in the family, school, community, state and nationThe student’s role as follower or leaderThe effects of changing situations upon leadership roles in the family, classroom and schoolWe will discuss about other topics next time.

Life skills education is introduced so that an individual can positively and effectively deal with the everyday life problems ..whether it's a issue of finance of home...personal skills such as self-awareness, and to interpersonal skills..practical thinking about life...family relations..Health and livelihood education..child and youth development..Problem solving skills.. etc. That is all in life skills education. ...which you can easily learn by just focusing on environment around you..But it is good because it technically trains a human to how to live a life..and face problems ..
